title: UNHCR Refugee Population Statistics Database
text: refugees R package designed facilitate access United Nations High Commissioner Refugees (UNHCR) Refugee Data Finder. provides easy--use interface database, covers forcibly displaced populations, including refugees, asylum-seekers, internally displaced people, stateless people, others span 70 years. package provides data three major sources: Data UNHCR’s annual statistical activities dating back 1951. Data United Nations Relief Works Agency Palestine Refugees Near East (UNRWA), specifically registered Palestine refugees UNRWA’s mandate. Data Internal Displacement Monitoring Centre (IDMC) people displaced within country due conflict violence.

title: UNHCR Refugee Population Statistics Database
text: refugees package includes eight datasets: population: Data forcibly displaced stateless persons year, including refugees, asylum-seekers, returned refugees, internally displaced persons (IDPs), stateless persons. idmc: Data Internal Displacement Monitoring Centre total number IDPs due conflict violence. asylum_applications: Data asylum applications including procedure type application type. asylum_decisions: Data asylum decisions, including recognised, rejected, otherwise closed claims. demographics: Demographic sub-national data, available, including age sex disaggregation. solutions: Data durable solutions refugees IDPs. unrwa: Data registered Palestine refugees UNRWA’s mandate. flows: Numbers people forced flee years since 1962. Please check individual dataset description details content dataset.
